name: Hammy Go Round
description:
"An endless runner that does some interesting things with its structure" - Touch Arcade

"Hammy Go Round invents the hamster wheel of platform gaming" - AppAdvice

"An interesting spin on the genre’s formula" - TouchTapPlay

They live on twinned worlds - so close, so similar, but so unreachable. But true love knows no boundaries. So he sets out on a chancy journey to meet his precious one. And nothing will get in his way, will it?

○○○
